column5: Ask BrunelOur Digital Design and Branding MSc degree is a modern, hands-on course that combines digital technology and creative design. It has been designed to equip you with advanced knowledge and practical skills required for a creative role in the digital branding industry.You’ll develop deep understanding of advanced digital design practices within the context of branding.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full time: 1-2 years | Part time: 2-3 years
